If you find yourself wondering why you never get to do something, why people are always mean or indifferent to you or wondering why some tragedy always seems to befall you then you need to stop asking questions and start working towards change.
If your HR department or a team leader is regularly required to ensure that team members stop bickering and get back to work, your workplace emotional intelligence is definitely suffering.
